name: Boots of Dancing [fading]
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity an average amount.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users physical resistance adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users cold resistance adequately.
It increases the users fire resistance adequately.
The boots aid in dancing skills.
The boots alter the user's resistances somehow.
